title: Burial of a lightning strike
support: Described as a 'tabula', 1 foot long by 3/4 foot wide

provenanceFound._: Described in the 16th century as found in an underground oven or kiln in Taormina; subsequent descriptions assigning it to Palermo suggest that it was moved there, before being lost.
